page.title: 09Industries in Monmouth
page.content: {Unemployment}is quite high in the area. Although predominately an agricultural area there was a large{factory}making central heating radiators now unfortunately closed with many job losses. There is one fairly large employer manufacturing{cardboard for packaging. A light{industrial site}has been developed at{Wonastow Road.}These include packaging, transport, computer software, farm equipment, civil engineering contractors, tyre fitters, egg packaging and distribution, motor factors, precision engineering, builders'merchant, grocery provisions cash and carry. There are sites unoccupied at the moment and Monmouth has recently lost its eligibility for{government grant aid which might inhibit further growth.
